item.title: Ventilation and Air Quality Formulas
item.description: When fact checking claims, trying to achieve targets and assessing risk, you might need to do some math. Here are the most common formulas you need.

item.title: The Problem With Using Air Changes per Hour
item.description: ACH measures how often the air is changed in a room. It's used in medical settings for preventing infection. It's now used everywhere in guidance (I've used it too). The problem is, there's no basis in physics for it.

item.title: What's the right metric for clean air?
item.description: We know we want cleaner air, but it's not completely clear how to measure it.
